Net Debt to EBITDA = Net Debt / EBITDA
Source: Annual reports, Quarterly reports, Crisil Intelligence
## Key observation
* Sterlite Electric Limited accounts for approximately 15% market share in the Indian power conductors market, in Fiscal 2025 in value terms
* Sterlite Electric Limited accounts for 25 to 28% market share in High Ampacity and AL59 conductors market, in Fiscal 2025 in value terms
* Sterlite Electric Limited reported the third highest CAGR in revenue from operations of 22.94% from Fiscal 2023 to Fiscal 2025 among the considered peers
* Among the considered peers, Sterlite Electric Limited reported the second highest EBITDA margin in Fiscal 2025 of 10.87%
* Among the peers considered, Sterlite Electric Limited reported the second highest RoCE in Fiscal 2025 of 28.30%
* Sterlite Electric Limited reported the second highest net cash surplus of â‚¹. 8,963.15 million in Fiscal 2025 among the peers considered.
